title.value: Возделывание пажитника греческого (Trigonella foenum graecum L.) в Беларуси
Cultivation of common fenugreek (Trigonella foenum graecum L.) in Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Shelyuto, B.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In article the characteristic of a new for the Republic of Belarus fodder crop - common fenugreek (Trigonella foenum graecum L.). There was shows the history of its origin, forage value of green mass and seed. There were presented the results of studying the varieties of different geographical origins of this culture, sowing terms and rates in the North-Eastern part of Belarus. All studied in course of four years varieties of fenugreek showed high yielding capacity - 2,9-4,2 t / ha of dry matter and 590-1074 kg / ha of seeds and productivity. Metabolizable energy yield in the dry mass was 31,8-45,3 and in seeds - 8,1-14,7 GJ / ha. Chiadonha variety on the average over 4 years of research has provided dry weight yield of 4.2 t / ha. This was on 0.7 t / ha higher compared with the average yield on five varieties, and was equal to 20.0%. Specified variety had the highest yield on seeds, averaging over 4 years 1074 kg / ha, which was higher than the average for 5 other varieties on 256 kg / ha (31.3%).
